Description: * {{PageRef|Sinner's Sacrifice}} initial spawn time reduced from 10 min to 8 min (respawn rate is still 5 min)
* Fixed a bug with {{PageRef|Denizen|alt_name=Neutral}} bounty later in the game being reduced by more than the initial intended -15% (this fix was released yesterday)
* Restorative Locket: No longer grants +10% Spirit Resist
* Divine Barrier: Shields reduced from 260 to 230
